qas.question: What talk show did the doctor who performed Donda West's plastic surgery appear on?
What was the final cause of Donda's death determined by the coroner?

answers.text: "coronary artery disease and multiple post-operative factors due to or as a consequence of liposuction and mammoplasty"

qas.question: What was the name of the West's family's attorney during the incident surrounding the death of Donda West?
What reasons did West's family give for filing complaints against Adams and Aboolian?
On what show did Adams appear to "defend himself"?
On what day did the final coroner's report show that Donda died from heart disease and complications from surgery?

context: Adams sent condolences to Donda West's family but declined to publicly discuss the procedure, citing confidentiality. West’s family, through celebrity attorney <a2_0>Ed McPherson<a2_0/>, filed complaints with the Medical Board against Adams and Aboolian for <a3_0>violating patient confidentiality<a3_0/> following her death. Adams had previously been under scrutiny by the medical board. He appeared on <a0_0><a4_0>Larry King Live<a4_0/><a0_0/> on November 20, 2007, but left before speaking. Two days later, he appeared again, with his attorney, stating he was there to "defend himself". He said that the recently released autopsy results "spoke for themselves". The final coroner's report <a5_0>January 10, 2008<a5_0/>, concluded that Donda West died of <a1_0>"coronary artery disease and multiple post-operative factors due to or as a consequence of liposuction and mammoplasty"<a1_0/>.
